businessProfile.name: The Upper Crust
businessProfile.address: 97 Sea Island Pkwy #201, Beaufort, SC 29907, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 97 Sea Island Pkwy #201, Beaufort, SC 29907, USA

reviews.text:
I reviewed this hometown favorite a bit harsher than maybe I should. The food is constantly good. Tbe atmosphere is cozy.
The staff works their butts off. But this was a Friday night an I was in need if more water.
My portions were worth the cost. I got the lunch portion. My wife ate the salad.
We will definitely be back. Sure hope they find some help.

Chris from the reatreat on lady"s island best pizza best wings best service. I've loved this place even in old place. The owner the staff I will always spend my money here. This is cheers the show in my neighborhood. You will never be sorry here I haven't it's my treat when I can thanks lady's and gents staff.that comes from a chef. From Mr Chris reatreat worker and neighborhood resident .

I became familiar with The Upper Crust while living in the Liberty County area of Georgia. I've been in South Carolina for the last 12 years in an area without an Upper Crust available. I moved to Lady's Island a short time ago and rediscovered The Upper Crust. Absolutely wonderful. I understand food service can be hit or miss at times but,this time it was a hit

We got a pizza for takeout & it was incredibly delicious. I‚Äôm from New Jersey & I‚Äôm always looking for South Jersey Shore Boardwalk pizza that I had growing up & this was it. We will definitely be back for more. Thank you guys for making amazing pizza.
The wraps are amazing and the pizza is too. The service is always good and I always eat here when I visit Beaufort or Hilton head.  You will not regret it!

editorial_summary.overview: Low-key institution dishing up casual Italian & American grub, including pizza, grinders & salads.

recentReviews.text: I had high hopes since this seems to be a town favorite, but I was disappointed. We ordered fried mozzarella for an appetizer and we all enjoyed them. I received a ‚ÄúCaesar salad‚Äù that was warm lettuce, store-bought croutons and a small portion of dressing. My kids enjoyed their pepperoni pizza, but they also rave about Little Caesar and school pizza so I‚Äôm not sure their palates are reliable‚Ä¶ I ordered eggplant Parmesan but sent it back bc it very cold. I just asked for it off the bill since I didn‚Äôt want to upset the kitchen staff. The tables were dirty and the server lacked basic customer service skills. Not too sure why this place came recommended, but it‚Äôs not somewhere I would like to dine again.
Upper crust is always great. Never had anything bad
Food is awesome.  Always yummy and on time. Pleasant service

Chris from the reatreat on lady"s island best pizza best wings best service. I've loved this place even in old place. The owner the staff I will always spend my money here. This is cheers the show in my neighborhood. You will never be sorry here I haven't it's my treat when I can thanks lady's and gents staff.that comes from a chef. From Mr Chris reatreat worker and neighborhood resident .
Great place to grab a bite to eat.

detailedReviews.author: Carolyn Wolf
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Rosalyn Holt
detailedReviews.text: I had high hopes since this seems to be a town favorite, but I was disappointed. We ordered fried mozzarella for an appetizer and we all enjoyed them. I received a ‚ÄúCaesar salad‚Äù that was warm lettuce, store-bought croutons and a small portion of dressing. My kids enjoyed their pepperoni pizza, but they also rave about Little Caesar and school pizza so I‚Äôm not sure their palates are reliable‚Ä¶ I ordered eggplant Parmesan but sent it back bc it very cold. I just asked for it off the bill since I didn‚Äôt want to upset the kitchen staff. The tables were dirty and the server lacked basic customer service skills. Not too sure why this place came recommended, but it‚Äôs not somewhere I would like to dine again.

detailedReviews.author: Thaddeus Stubblefield
detailedReviews.text: Upper crust is always great. Never had anything bad

detailedReviews.author: Joy J
detailedReviews.text: Food is awesome.  Always yummy and on time. Pleasant service

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Smith
detailedReviews.text: Chris from the reatreat on lady"s island best pizza best wings best service. I've loved this place even in old place. The owner the staff I will always spend my money here. This is cheers the show in my neighborhood. You will never be sorry here I haven't it's my treat when I can thanks lady's and gents staff.that comes from a chef. From Mr Chris reatreat worker and neighborhood resident .

detailedReviews.author: Tana Isenhour
detailedReviews.text: Great place to grab a bite to eat.

detailedReviews.author: coastal cottage
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza experience! Thank you

detailedReviews.author: Matt D
detailedReviews.text: Family at the beach for a week. We ordered take out from here twice because it was so good. Special props to the fat boy pizza, super yummy!

detailedReviews.author: Paula
detailedReviews.text: The wraps are amazing and the pizza is too. The service is always good and I always eat here when I visit Beaufort or Hilton head.  You will not regret it!

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Siegfried
detailedReviews.text: I ordered two pizza and garlic knots DoorDash dropped off part of order was missing DoorDash said no their problem when I called in to upper crust the girl on the phone lied and said they were on their way with them called back an hour later and was told since I‚Äôm not a resident of sc that next time I come to this state they will give me a free order. I paid almost 100 dollars in pizza and they would not even make sure I got the complete order

detailedReviews.author: Elaine Long
detailedReviews.text: We got a pizza for takeout & it was incredibly delicious. I‚Äôm from New Jersey & I‚Äôm always looking for South Jersey Shore Boardwalk pizza that I had growing up & this was it. We will definitely be back for more. Thank you guys for making amazing pizza.

detailedReviews.author: mark hastings
detailedReviews.text: Fat boy is a must A+

detailedReviews.author: Jane Truslow
detailedReviews.text: Online order was easy, pizza was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Derek Fox
detailedReviews.text: This pizza sucked so bad I don't even want to waste my time reviewing it First time in my life I threw pizza away

detailedReviews.author: Linda Majors Lathrop
detailedReviews.text: This has been a local favorite for years. Food is consistently good. Pizzas, grinders, subs, salads - always fresh and prepared properly. They get busy but service is always A+.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Russell
detailedReviews.text: Always a pleasant experience!

detailedReviews.author: Eric Gibbs
detailedReviews.text: Always great food and great service, don't miss out!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Nancy Hutchison
detailedReviews.text: The staff is wonderful and always so polite! We love the food and eat from The Upper Crust often. We appreciate all of you. Thanks

detailedReviews.author: Dwayne Tillman
detailedReviews.text: Food was delicious and ready for pickup when I arrived!!

detailedReviews.author: Shirley Yoakum
detailedReviews.text: I love their pizzas and wraps!  The spinach stuffed shells are to die for too!

detailedReviews.author: Darcie Harriott
detailedReviews.text: Best chicken salad anywhere around! Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Me Here
detailedReviews.text: I became familiar with The Upper Crust while living in the Liberty County area of Georgia. I've been in South Carolina for the last 12 years in an area without an Upper Crust available. I moved to Lady's Island a short time ago and rediscovered The Upper Crust. Absolutely wonderful. I understand food service can be hit or miss at times but,this time it was a hit

detailedReviews.author: Bridgett Burrows
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service

detailedReviews.author: Betty Hinderliter
detailedReviews.text: Love Upper Crust yummy pizzas, pasta and hot sandwiches! Their salads are very good too. Dine in is casual and service is quick. We also appreciate delivery service.

detailedReviews.author: Janice Wilkins
detailedReviews.text:
Excellent service!!
Delicious food!!!üòõ

detailedReviews.author: Gerie Martin
detailedReviews.text: Love this place!  Clean, friendly and great service.  Pizzas are delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Lin
detailedReviews.text: If you want an extra salad dressing, you‚Äôll have a better chance of walking to the moon than you will having them actually include it in a to go box or on DoorDash, no matter how much you pay for it or how many times or how many ways you remind them of it on your order.  No kidding. Literally dozens of times.  I had boycotted the place for months because of it, and just started trying it again, but lo and behold, they‚Äôre still at their dirty little tricks. Go to Piace or Ryan‚Äôs. Or Pizza Hut or Dominos for that matter.  You have a hell of a lot better chance of actually getting your extra, paid for salad dressing.

detailedReviews.author: Donald Gilbert
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town. Our go to spot!

detailedReviews.author: Pam Holbrook
detailedReviews.text: Went today with my husband.  We ordered a pizza and two sodas.  After nursing our sodas for 45 minutes without getting checked on by our waitress even once, we were informed that our pizza had been "dropped as it was getting taken out of the oven".  They were going to put in another one, and offered us a discount.  We were sitting g were we could hear the kitchen noise and nothing was "dropped".  It wasn't a complete loss as we were comped the two sodas, leaving as hungry as we had arrived.

detailedReviews.author: Carmalita Lawton
detailedReviews.text: Awesome service. Kitchen does an awesome Gluten Free pizza!! Best in Beaufort!

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Gangway
detailedReviews.text: 18 inch pizza was huge!! We got just cheese for the kids and they loved it. We will definitely order from here again.

detailedReviews.author: Honey Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Love this place! Everything is delicious and staff is always friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Ron Wharton
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was terrific,  As a previous pizza chef in Illinois, I found there pizza extremely good,  good consistency, topping and cheese. Enjoyed it !!!

detailedReviews.author: John Caldwell
detailedReviews.text: We had pizza and salad to go tonight.  The food was delicious as  always.

detailedReviews.author: Kenny Yaw
detailedReviews.text: Great people, good food. Nice atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Will Kelley
detailedReviews.text: Love lady‚Äôs island uppercrust great service and even better food.

detailedReviews.author: marlon green
detailedReviews.text: Love this place not one complaint

detailedReviews.author: Judith Harter
detailedReviews.text:
I am from the Beaufort area I've been going to upper crust for years however the last two times I went there my pizza was not cooked one-time dough raw of the time vegetables not cooked. I have called to speak to the manager because I hate throwing away $40 Pizza but nobody will return my phone call I went there to support our local businesses. I am very disappointed I don't know if it's New Management needless to say I come home and I was in the mood for pizza so I had to cook a frozen pizza while having the $40 upper crust Pizza on my calendar.
I do not like leaving bad reviews but if somebody would call me and handle this may have been different

detailedReviews.author: Sandy Love
detailedReviews.text: Went in for p/u greeted at door stated my purpose at which time she exited and didn‚Äôt come back. After standing there for 10 minutes or so I decide take seat at bar maybe get something to drink ‚Ä¶. 5 people behind the bar 2 of them eating out of bowls while walking around the other 3 leaning against bar chatting. No one at all acknowledged me or ask if they could help me . I finally spoke up and said excuse me may I get a soda? The male standing there said no.,,, ha ha . I returned with I figured I would ask since no one has bother to speak or ask me if I needed anything or could they help me. Guess  they were all too busy talking, laughing and eating. Who ever is the owner/manager would be so proud of his lazy unprofessional staff!  BAD SERVICE!!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Tricia Graham
detailedReviews.text:
Food speaks for itself, it's the staff that makes it fabulous.
All teens, great customer service skills. Which is truly rare
A pleasure

detailedReviews.author: Maxine Lutz
detailedReviews.text: Good food

detailedReviews.author: Rebekah Carr
detailedReviews.text: This is my favorite local pizza place. Do yourself a favor and get the garlic knots!

detailedReviews.author: David Luck
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food.  We had the chicken alfredo and the stuffed shells with the garlic knots as an appetizer.  We also ordered a medium pizza to take home.  The waitress was very attentive and engaged. I hope we can make it back here.

detailedReviews.author: Bonnie Miller
detailedReviews.text: Consistently delicious food, and great service!!!

detailedReviews.author: Phoenix flooring and design
detailedReviews.text: Just visited for the first time tonight,we really enjoyed the service and the pizza as well as the cheese sticks the food came out in a timely manor and very tasty.jamey our server was awesome great place to grab a great pie...

detailedReviews.author: Jack Crack
detailedReviews.text: Celebrated 65 wedding anniversary of father and mother in law here and they made it special

detailedReviews.author: Paul Schwartz
detailedReviews.text: Soggy shitty pie. Sauce & toppings falling off. It‚Äôs as if they don‚Äôt have a hot pizza oven technique. Total waste of $43.90. Next time Piace is closed then I will refrain from ordering from here. And I knew this about Upper Crust as a result of all my past experiences. It had been a while, but shame on me if I ever order their crap again.

detailedReviews.author: Colin 111
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was soggy. It may have other excellent dishes, but who likes soggy pizza?

detailedReviews.author: Chris Bell
detailedReviews.text: A quiet Italian eatery with a laid back atmosphere.  I had the Alfredo with shrimp and it was a perfect comfort dish.

detailedReviews.author: Fred Barnhart
detailedReviews.text: This place is a haven from the downtown presumption of good food. Everything was excellent. Not an Italian pinnacle of cuisine, but a great place for an American restaurant with Italian food. It‚Äôs the best place to get a good meal once you are done with all the places your family takes you to impress you. Take a break and have a solid meal.

detailedReviews.author: William Birch
detailedReviews.text: Lasagna was great and so was the calzone. You get big portions

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Sullivan
detailedReviews.text: 2 stars because if I pay $70 for a pizza, sandwich, and chili cheese fries and it shows up 25 minutes later than estimated, it's cold.  I'm not happy.

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Gilliam
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great service.

detailedReviews.author: Haiden Milhimes
detailedReviews.text: Bailee and Rachel are the best bartenders and give customers great service! Josh is always on alert and making sure everyone is getting their food done right and making sure their drinks are topped off! Couldn‚Äôt ask for a better experience here

detailedReviews.author: savannah martinez
detailedReviews.text: First time trying it their pizza was amazing!! Super fresh I will be coming back anytime I'm craving pizza! üçï it's my new favorite ‚ò∫Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Megan Doll
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza and Greek dressing! Take out is quick! The staff are very kind and friendly if you eat in.

detailedReviews.author: vergie gibson
detailedReviews.text: This place was Very customer friendly  and the food was good  But if you can try the French Bread ü•ñ  it is delish üòã

detailedReviews.author: Luke Fairchild
detailedReviews.text: The prices of the food is not worth. It has gone up so much in the last 6 months.

detailedReviews.author: Kerry Sullivan
detailedReviews.text: We ordered for the first time here today. Definitely not worth the $32 we spent. My dish was covered in way too much sauce that tasted like a bag of sugar was poured into it. The is is the 3rd restaurant we‚Äôve tried since we‚Äôve moved here and we haven‚Äôt found a place that knows how to make authentic Italian food. We will not be back.

detailedReviews.author: Lucia Whitmill
detailedReviews.text: This place needs pest control badly I can't eat food where I see the roaches it made me sick üò´ I know all restaurants have some kind of pest but it was terrible .I think they need a manager that is more experienced in hospitality as well.

detailedReviews.author: Candie Kavo
detailedReviews.text: Staff is friendly and pizza is good.

detailedReviews.author: Cynthia Rotunda
detailedReviews.text: Our girl was young, and we were a large extended family. She was amazing at how well she handled all the orders, drinks, and challenges we brought with us. We were very happy she was our waitress...

detailedReviews.author: brooke
detailedReviews.text: First time having this place. Paid 4.00 extra for fries, didn‚Äôt even get them. Kind of disappointed. Pickle was mid.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Correll
detailedReviews.text: Ordered from the app to deliver to Fripp (the only restaurant that will bring to your door here).  Gyro Wrap was huge and full of meat and toppings.  The Cajun Chicken Alfredo was spicy and delicious.  All parties at our house were pleased and pleasantly surprised at the speed of which it was delivered and the taste given how far they had to travel to deliver.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.4/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the delicious and authentic taste of the pizza, reminiscent of South Jersey Shore Boardwalk pizza. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The service is always pleasant and consistently receives high marks, even during busy times. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant is a beloved local favorite, with customers frequently returning and recommending it to others. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues, including complaints about service quality, incorrect orders, and food quality - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and service issues, such as delayed or incorrect orders and inattentive staff - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Poor online visibility and competition issues, as indicated by customers choosing competitors due to dissatisfaction - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
